question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What are African-Americans tired of explaining?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

credentials.translatedString: lives in The United States of America (1969-present)

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What are African-Americans tired of explaining?", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "How throwing Black on Black crime in our face doesn't silence us from talking about police brutality", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Blindly siding with the police everytime a Black person is killed is intellectually lazy at best and\u2026 at worst, racist", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Why Blackface is wrong", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "That I don't have to have your skin color to be sexy, respectable or smart", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "That micro-aggressions against minorities actually exist.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "That the act of \u2018talking about racism\u2019 does not make you racist", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "That not ", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": "all", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": " Black people are poor, ghetto and violent", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The definition of racism (some White people seem to want to redefine the word)", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "No\u2026 you're right, \u201cI don't know what's in his heart\u201d\u2026 but I do know he's racist", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "That White people have a head start over others. That was the point of slavery, headright programs and Jim Crow segregation after all.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The concept of reparations is not and should not be based on how much money the perpetrator of the crime has or the fact that slavery ended a long time ago.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Jim Crow ended very recently and housing discrimination", "modifiers": {}}, {"text": " ", "modifiers": {"bold": true}}, {"text": "along with the draconian drugs laws we Blacks were faced with, ended even more recently\u2026 many people are still dealing with it today.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 1, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Police brutality not only hasn't ended.. It's just now even getting noticed", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 1, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Telling me that you're a poor White person doesn't mitigate my life experiences with systematic racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Explaining to people that a few incidences of racism from Blacks is bad\u2026 but not the same as systemic racism, for which there is no escape.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "The whole, \u201cwhat about Asians\u201d, question.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Explaining why it's OK to protest against injustice (you would think this would be common sense, as this was the basis of the formation of America).", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "unordered-list", "is_rtl": false}]}
